words.word: How long can I borrow this book for?
words.ipa: haʊ lɔŋ kən aɪ ˈbɑˌroʊ ðɪs bʊk fər?

words.word: Have you got this T-shirt in a medium?

words.word: Can I see that doll, please?
words.ipa: kən aɪ si ðət dɑl, pliz?
words.mean: Tôi có thể xem con búp bê đó được không?

words.word: I'd like a loaf of bread, please.
words.ipa: aɪd laɪk ə loʊf əv brɛd, pliz.
words.mean: Tôi muốn một ổ bánh mì, làm ơn.
